issue.title: On windows 10 most of the time the wallet is in the - (not responding) mode, please tell me what to do
issue.body:
<!-- This issue tracker is only for technical issues related to Bitcoin Core.

General bitcoin questions and/or support requests are best directed to the Bitcoin StackExchange at https://bitcoin.stackexchange.com.

For reporting security issues, please read instructions at https://bitcoincore.org/en/contact/.

If the node is "stuck" during sync or giving "block checksum mismatch" errors, please ensure your hardware is stable by running memtest and observe CPU temperature with a load-test tool such as linpack before creating an issue! -->

<!-- Describe the issue -->

**Expected behavior**

<!--- What behavior did you expect? -->

**Actual behavior**

<!--- What was the actual behavior (provide screenshots if the issue is GUI-related)? -->

**To reproduce**

<!--- How reliably can you reproduce the issue, what are the steps to do so? -->

**System information**

<!-- What version of Bitcoin Core are you using, where did you get it (website, self-compiled, etc)? -->

<!-- What type of machine are you observing the error on (OS/CPU and disk type)? -->

<!-- GUI-related issue? What is your operating system and its version? If Linux, what is your desktop environment and graphical shell? -->

<!-- Any extra information that might be useful in the debugging process. -->
<!--- This is normally the contents of a `debug.log` or `config.log` file. Raw text or a link to a pastebin type site are preferred. -->

events.body: Is this still an issue with a recent version of Bitcoin Core? If yes, what are the steps to reproduce?

rename.from: на виндовс 10 большую часть времени кошелёк находится в режиме - (не отвечает), пожалуйста подскажите что делать.on windows 10 most of the time the wallet is in the - (not responding) mode, please tell me what to do
rename.to: On windows 10 most of the time the wallet is in the - (not responding) mode, please tell me what to do

events.body: Is this right after installing? Any previous version worked fine?

> Это сразу после установки? Любая предыдущая версия работала нормально?

version 0.18 worked well, on Windows 7, after upgrading to 0.19 and problems started, and when I switched from Windows 7 to 10 it generally became very slow, when I started troubleshooting compatibility issues, it indicates that the product is designed for Windows 8...
What's the size of wallet.dat, it's placed in bitcoin data directory.

> Каков размер wallet.dat, он находится в каталоге данных биткойнов.

1 585 340 bytes

Possible fix in #18904 
You can clone https://github.com/bvbfan/bitcoin/tree/lsn_reset_fix and follow instructions how to compile it.
NOTE: Keep copy of your wallet.dat in any case if you want to run this patch.

I solved the problem by installing the previous version 0.18.1
everything works without problems, not knowing English and the programming language, I think it's hard to figure it out by following the instructions, thank you all for the feedback))
The code is same, issue present on 0.17.x as well. I don't want to bother you but using older unsupported version is not recommended.

> Код такой же, проблема присутствует и на 0.17.x. Я не хочу вас беспокоить, но использовать старую неподдерживаемую версию не рекомендуется.

what can go wrong when using the old version?

Many things can go wrong :) Since hard forks (the biggest stopper) are not often used, now days, using older version can lead to security risk, supported versions receive security fixes which may or may not present in older one.

Same here.. it's almost unusable.. Not responding most of the time.. same as previous version.
So now i'm gonna transfer to another wallet because i'm really pi.. off. Please fix this (for real)

@bitcoinlover2021 It would be easier to address the issue if you could provide the steps to reproduce. What version does this refer to? Is this right after installing? Have previous versions worked better? What is the size of the wallet?
Closing this issue for lack of response and reproducible steps.
